Eclipse 20060829-0800, Linux/GTK
Forgot to add that Eclipse has to be killed forcibly as error windows are appearing again and again and it's impossible to do anything about it from application.

This is a JFace bug caused by fixing bug 149193. Works if I use JFace from I20060815-0948.

Marking as critical since data can get lost.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 155575 ***
